node.title: Project Kavvaii's Aozora Kurumi Graduates
node.description: Project Kavvaii's pioneer VTuber Aozora Kurumi has graduated as she held her final stream Sunday, August 7. Kurumi reads letters from fans, sings songs and reflects on her VTubing career.
